de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.im.adapter.data

Class AbstractImComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.im.adapter.data.AbstractImComponent
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ImObjectComponent, ImRawComponent

    public abstract class AbstractImComponent
extends Object
    Generic base, that holds a message concerning an integrity measurement component. It defines the minimum attributes needed for the addressing of the component to/from an IM(C/V). Especially important for inheritance.

        Creates a base with the necessary address attributes.
        Parameters:
        vendorId - the vendor ID describing the component
        type - the type ID describing the component
        collectorId - the referred IMC
        validatorId - the referred IMV
